data.name: kstidAudioFileMissingMsg
data.value: The audio file '{0}' is cannot be found.

data.name: kstidDataSourceEditorMissingMsg
data.value: The editor '{0}' cannot be found.

data.name: kstidDefaultNewProjectName
data.value: New Project

data.name: kstidDefaultProjFileFolderName
data.value: Phonology Assistant
data.comment: Name of the default folder in the user's My Documents (on XP) or Documents (on Vista) where PA's settings file and projects are located (the user can save their projects anywhere they like, this is just the default). This is also the folder that contains the subfolder where PA training projects are unpacked.

data.name: kstidDropDownNoneEntry
data.value: (none)
data.comment: Used for combo box drop-down lists from which no value may be chosen

data.name: kstidErrorLoadingCacheFiles
data.value: Error loading cache files: {0}
data.comment: Parameter is the error message thrown by the system.

data.name: kstidErrorLoadingProject
data.value: The followng error occurred loading project '{0}'.\n\n{1}

data.name: kstidErrorLoadingProjectFieldInfo
kstidErrorProcessingDataSourceFile
data.value: Error processing data source file '{0}'.

data.name: kstidErrorProjectInvalidFormat
data.value: Project File '{0}' has an Invalid Format

data.name: kstidErrorReadingDataSourceFile
data.value: The following error occurred reading data source file '{0}'.{1}
data.comment: Parameter 0 is file name; parameter 1 is error message.

data.name: kstidHelpFileMissingMsg
data.value: The help file '{0}' cannot be found.

data.name: kstidInvalidToolboxSortField
data.value: The field '{0}' is invalid.

data.name: kstidLoadingRecordCacheError
data.value: The following error occurred while loading '{0}':\n{1}
data.comment: Message displayed when failing to load a PAXML file. Parameter 0 is filename, and parameter 1 is the error message.

data.name: kstidMissingClassMsg
data.value: The class '{0}' is not in this project. It may have been deleted.
data.comment: Message displayed when a search pattern contains a class that doesn't exist in the project.

data.name: kstidMissingDataSourceOFDMsg
data.value: Choose New Data Source Location
data.comment: Message displayed in the open file dialog when the user is pointing PA to the new location of a data source file.

data.name: kstidNoAudioField
data.value: This project doesn't contain a field definition for audio files.

data.name: kstidNoDataSourceEditorSpecifiedMsg
kstidNoToolboxSortFieldSpecified
data.value: The first Toolbox sort field for this record's data source has not\nbeen specified. To specify the first Toolbox sort field, go to the\ndata source's properties from the project properties dialog.

data.name: kstidParsingDataMsg
data.value: Parsing Data...
data.comment: Progress bar text after SFM data source is read and the data is being parsed.

data.name: kstidPatternParsingErrorMsg
data.value: The following error(s) occurred when parsing the search pattern:\n\n{0}

data.name: kstidReadingCacheFiles
data.value: Reading Cache Files
data.comment: Progress bar text when reading cache files when loading a project

data.name: kstidReadingDataSourceProgressLabel
data.value: Reading {0}
data.comment: Progress bar text when reading data source files.

data.name: kstidRecordMarkerFieldDisplayText
data.value: Record Marker
data.comment: Text for the record marker field in the mappings dialog.

data.name: kstidSAMissingMsg
data.value: Speech Analyzer cannot be found. Please make sure it is installed.

data.name: kstidSAMissingMsgWSpeedRef
data.value: Speech Analyzer is required to playback utterances at speeds other than 100%.\nHowever, Speech Analyzer cannot be found. Please make sure it is installed.

data.name: kstidSavingRecordCacheError
data.value: Error saving records: {0}
data.comment: Message displayed if there was an error saving the records to an XML file.

data.name: kstidSplashScreenLoadingMsg
data.value: Loading...

data.name: kstidSrchPatternOneOrMoreError
data.value:
The one-or-more symbol (+) was found in an invalid location within
the search pattern. The one-or-more symbol may only be the first
item in the preceding environment and/or the last item in the environment
after. Please correct this and try your search again.

data.name: kstidSrchPatternWordBoundaryError
data.value: The space/word boundary symbol (#) may not be the first or last\nitem in the search item portion (what precedes the slash) of the\nsearch pattern. Please correct this and try your search again.

data.name: kstidSrchPatternZeroOrMoreError
data.value:
The zero-or-more symbol (*) was found in an invalid location within
the search pattern. The zero-or-more symbol may only be the first
item in the preceding environment and/or the last item in the environment
after. Please correct this and try your search again.

data.name: kstidToolboxNotRunningMsg
kstidUnableToEditSourceRecordMsg
data.value: There is no source record editor associated with this record.

data.name: kstidViewInitProgBarTemplate
data.value: Initializing {0} View...
data.comment: Template for progress bar text text when a view is being initialized
